programme.title: T100 Triathlon - PTO - World Tour 2025 Final - Doha
programme.desc: The T100 Triathlon World Tour Final lands in Doha/Lusail (10–13 December 2025) as the season-ending showdown that crowns the T100 World Champion. programme.title: Arsenal vs Brighton & Hove Albion - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Arsenal have won just three of their eight Premier League home games against Brighton, only having a lower win rate against Wimbledon and Liverpool among sides they’ve faced 5+ times. Brighton are winless in their last four Premier League games against Arsenal, though they did come from behind to draw 1-1 in both meetings last season.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Wolves’ Jørgen Strand Larsen has failed to score in his last eight Premier League appearances, his outright longest goal drought in the competition. Hugo Ekitike has scored in each of his last three league appearances and could be the first Liverpool player other than Mohamed Salah to score in four consecutive outings in the Premier League since Sadio Mané in February 2019.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Leeds United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19
programme.desc: Liverpool have scored 19 goals in their last five Premier League matches against Leeds, although they let a 2-0 lead slip to draw 3-3 at Elland Road in December, their highest scoring draw ever with the Whites. Leeds won 2-1 in their last away league game against Liverpool in October 2022. They’ve never won consecutive visits to the Reds in their league history.

programme.title: Sunderland vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19
programme.desc: Sunderland have lost their last three Premier League home games against Man City, having won four in a row against them at the Stadium of Light before this. Since drawing 2-2 in April 2014, Manchester City have won their last seven Premier League matches against Sunderland, last enjoying a longer winning run against them between December 2002 and December 2009.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Arsenal have lost three of their last five Premier League matches against Aston Villa and could see Villa complete a league double over them for the third time in six seasons, something they’d done so just once previously in the competition beforehand, in 1992-93. Aston Villa are unbeaten in their last two away league games against Arsenal, beating them 2-0 in April 2024 and drawing 2-2 in January last season. They last had a longer run without defeat the Emirates between 2006-07 and 2008-09.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19 - Mini Matc
programme.desc: Man Utd have won eight of their last 11 Premier League matches against Wolves, beating them 4-1 earlier this month at Molineux. Wolves won this exact fixture 1-0 last season, last winning consecutive away league games against Man Utd between March 1960 and September 1961.

programme.title: Rayo Vallecano vs Getafe - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18
programme.desc: Rayo Vallecano are unbeaten in their last eight LaLiga matches against Getafe, keeping seven clean sheets in those games; their longest ever unbeaten run against them in the top-flight. Getafe have won just 15% of their LaLiga clashes against Rayo Vallecano, with their win rate only lower against Barcelona, Atlético de Madrid and Real Madrid in the competition's history.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Arsenal have lost three of their last five Premier League matches against Aston Villa and could see Villa complete a league double over them for the third time in six seasons, something they’d done so just once previously in the competition beforehand, in 1992-93. Aston Villa are unbeaten in their last two away league games against Arsenal, beating them 2-0 in April 2024 and drawing 2-2 in January last season. They last had a longer run without defeat the Emirates between 2006-07 and 2008-09.

programme.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18

Millwall have won their last two league games against Southampton and could complete a league double over the Lions for the first time the 1977-78 campaign in the second tier.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Sevilla - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 17 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Espanyol have only won one of their last six LaLiga games against Elche, the last of which was a 1-0 win in February 2023, and have not won two consecutive games against them in the competition since March 1985. After five consecutive home wins against Elche in LaLiga between 1975 and 1984, Espanyol have won just one of their subsequent five league matches against them at home, failing to win any of the last three.

programme.title: Villarreal vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 17 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Sociedad have lost two of their last three LaLiga matches against Sevilla, after having not lost any of their previous five against the Sevillians in the competition. Sevilla have lost two of their last three visits to Real Sociedad in LaLiga, although their last away league win against them came in March 2025. They have not won two consecutive away LaLiga matches against Real Sociedad since 2011.

programme.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: Arsenal vs. Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Arsenal have lost three of their last five Premier League matches against Aston Villa and could see Villa complete a league double over them for the third time in six seasons, something they’d done so just once previously in the competition beforehand, in 1992-93. Aston Villa are unbeaten in their last two away league games against Arsenal, beating them 2-0 in April 2024 and drawing 2-2 in January last season. They last had a longer run without defeat the Emirates between 2006-07 and 2008-09.

programme.title: Arsenal vs. Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026

programme.title: Manchester United vs. Newcastle United - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Manchester United have lost four of their last five Premier League games against Newcastle, as many as they had in their previous 38 against the Magpies. Newcastle did the league double over Manchester United last season, including a 2-0 win in this exact fixture. They’ve not won consecutive visits to Old Trafford since March 1935, while they last won three in a row against the Red Devils in January 1922.

programme.title: Arsenal vs. Brighton & Hove Albion - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Arsenal have won just three of their eight Premier League home games against Brighton, only having a lower win rate against Wimbledon and Liverpool among sides they’ve faced 5+ times. Brighton are winless in their last four Premier League games against Arsenal, though they did come from behind to draw 1-1 in both meetings last season.

programme.title: Chelsea vs. Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Aston Villa’s Morgan Rogers has been directly involved in more Premier League goals than any other English player across the opening 17 matchdays this season ; he could the third Villan to net 2+ goals in three consecutive appearances in the competition after Dean Saunders and Dion Dublin. Enzo Fernández has created more chances from open play and made more passes breaking the opponent’s defensive line than any other Chelsea player in the Premier League this season.

programme.title: Liverpool vs. Leeds United - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Liverpool have scored 19 goals in their last five Premier League matches against Leeds, although they let a 2-0 lead slip to draw 3-3 at Elland Road in December, their highest scoring draw ever with the Whites. Leeds won 2-1 in their last away league game against Liverpool in October 2022. They’ve never won consecutive visits to the Reds in their league history.

programme.title: Sunderland vs. Manchester City - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Sunderland have lost their last three Premier League home games against Man City, having won four in a row against them at the Stadium of Light before this. Arsenal have only failed to score in one of their 16 Premier League games against Bournemouth, though it was in a 2-0 defeat in this exact fixture last season.

programme.title: Arsenal vs. Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Arsenal have lost three of their last five Premier League matches against Aston Villa and could see Villa complete a league double over them for the third time in six seasons, something they’d done so just once previously in the competition beforehand, in 1992-93. Aston Villa are unbeaten in their last two away league games against Arsenal, beating them 2-0 in April 2024 and drawing 2-2 in January last season. They last had a longer run without defeat the Emirates between 2006-07 and 2008-09.

programme.title: Liverpool vs. Leeds United - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Liverpool have scored 19 goals in their last five Premier League matches against Leeds, although they let a 2-0 lead slip to draw 3-3 at Elland Road in December, their highest scoring draw ever with the Whites. Leeds won 2-1 in their last away league game against Liverpool in October 2022. They’ve never won consecutive visits to the Reds in their league history.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Sevilla - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 17 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Espanyol have only won one of their last six LaLiga games against Elche, the last of which was a 1-0 win in February 2023, and have not won two consecutive games against them in the competition since March 1985. After five consecutive home wins against Elche in LaLiga between 1975 and 1984, Espanyol have won just one of their subsequent five league matches against them at home, failing to win any of the last three.

programme.title: Villarreal vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 17 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Sociedad have lost two of their last three LaLiga matches against Sevilla, after having not lost any of their previous five against the Sevillians in the competition. Sevilla have lost two of their last three visits to Real Sociedad in LaLiga, although their last away league win against them came in March 2025. They have not won two consecutive away LaLiga matches against Real Sociedad since 2011.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Arsenal have lost three of their last five Premier League matches against Aston Villa and could see Villa complete a league double over them for the third time in six seasons, something they’d done so just once previously in the competition beforehand, in 1992-93. Aston Villa are unbeaten in their last two away league games against Arsenal, beating them 2-0 in April 2024 and drawing 2-2 in January last season. They last had a longer run without defeat the Emirates between 2006-07 and 2008-09.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19 - Mini Matc
programme.desc: Man Utd have won eight of their last 11 Premier League matches against Wolves, beating them 4-1 earlier this month at Molineux. Wolves won this exact fixture 1-0 last season, last winning consecutive away league games against Man Utd between March 1960 and September 1961.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Leeds United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Liverpool have scored 19 goals in their last five Premier League matches against Leeds, although they let a 2-0 lead slip to draw 3-3 at Elland Road in December, their highest scoring draw ever with the Whites. Leeds won 2-1 in their last away league game against Liverpool in October 2022. They’ve never won consecutive visits to the Reds in their league history.

programme.title: Sunderland vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Sunderland have lost their last three Premier League home games against Man City, having won four in a row against them at the Stadium of Light before this. programme.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: Melbourne City FC (AUS) vs Johor Darul Ta’zim FC (MAS) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Melbourne City and Johor Darul Ta’zim at the AFC Champions League Elite; Johor have won their only previous meeting against a side from Australia in the competition. Melbourne City have won each of their last two games at the AFC Champions League Elite, scoring multiple goals in each of them; a win here will give them their outright longest winning streak in the competition.

programme.title: Alexander ZVEREV (GER) vs Ben SHELTON (USA) - Final ATP 500 - Munich - BMW OPEN - 2025
programme.desc: Top seed Alexander Zverev (GER) faces second seed Ben Shelton (USA) in a compelling final at the BMW Open. Zverev, aiming for his 24th career title and third in Munich, leads their head-to-head 1–0, having won their previous encounter on hard court. Shelton, seeking his first ATP 500 title, makes history as the first American man since 2002 to reach a clay-court final at this level.

programme.desc: The Italy Major, held at Rome's Foro Italico from June 8 to 15, is one of the four Premier Padel Majors. programme.title: Flavio Cobolli (ITA) vs Andrey Rublev - Final - ATP 500 Hamburg European Open – 2025 - Final
programme.desc: Russia’s powerhouse Andrey Rublev, a former champion at Hamburg, returns to the final seeking his first title of the season. He’ll face Italy’s rising star Flavio Cobolli, who battled back in the semis from a set down to cement the biggest final of his career. Expect a thrilling clash of Rublev’s experience and firepower against Cobolli’s momentum and clay-court grit—just days before Roland Garros.

programme.title: Alexander BUBLIK (KAZ) vs Daniil MEDVEDEV - Final - ATP 500 Terra Wortmann Open 2025
programme.desc: Kazakhstan’s Alexander Bublik faces Russia’s Daniil Medvedev in a high-stakes grass-court final. Bublik returns to defend his 2023 title after a strong win over Khachanov, while Medvedev reached his first final in 15 months with a dramatic three-set victory over Zverev. Medvedev leads their head-to-head 4–2 and is chasing his first title of the season.

programme.title: Jannik SINNER (ITA) vs Learner TIEN (USA) - China Open, Beijing - 2025 - ATP 500 - Final
programme.desc: Jannik Sinner vs Learner Tien. Sinner reaches his third straight Beijing final—his 30th tour-level title match and ninth in a row on hard courts. Teenager Tien, 19, is into his first ATP final after Medvedev retired in the semis. First meeting between the pair. Fast hard court favors Sinner’s first-strike baseline power; Tien counters with speed and resilience. 500 ranking points and the Beijing crown at stake.

programme.title: Alejandro DAVIDOVICH FOKINA (ESP) vs Joao FONSECA (BRA) - ATP 500 - Swiss Indoors Basel - 2025
programme.desc: 54th edition at St. Jakobshalle, 18–26 Oct 2025. Total prize money €2,523,045. Fast indoor hard court with low bounce rewards first-strike tennis and often produces tiebreaks. With Turin qualification pressure, expect tight day/night sessions and high-seed upsets. Record champion: Roger Federer (10 titles).

programme.title: Final's - Arab Elite Tennis Championship - 2025
programme.desc: 5th Arab Tennis Elite Tournament – Manama, Bahrain concludes with the Singles Final as Mohammad Al Qutb (Jordan) meets Aziz Al Waqaa (Tunisia) on the hard courts of the Public Security Officers Club. A 24-player elite field from the Arab Tennis Federation circuit features ATP and ITF-ranked competitors, alongside a parallel U16 Arab Juniors event. Expect a high-tempo final shaped by big serving, aggressive returns and baseline control as the champion is crowned under the Manama lights.

programme.title: Italy vs Spain (Final) - Davis Cup (Final 8) 2025 - Bologna Fiere
programme.desc: The 2025 Davis Cup Final 8 runs 18–23 Nov at SuperTennis Arena, Bologna Fiere (indoor hard). Eight nations—host Italy plus seven Sept qualifiers (e.g., Germany, France, Austria, Argentina)—play single-day ties of two singles and, if needed, one doubles (best-of-three rubbers). Italy, the 2023–24 champion, chases a three-peat; stars such as Alcaraz, Zverev and Musetti are expected.

programme.title: Equatorial Guinea vs Algeria - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: Ibrahim Maza has completed the most dribbles and created the joint-most chances for Algeria at the 2025 CAF Africa Cup of Nations. If he plays in this match, he’ll be the first player under the age of 21 to appear in all three group stage games for Algeria in a single edition since Nabil Bentaleb in 2015. Iban Salvador is Equatorial Guinea’s top appearance maker at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations, but is currently on his longest run of games in the competition without a goal or assist. He hasn’t been involved in a goal since MD1 of the 2023 edition, netting his side’s only goal in a 1-1 draw with Nigeria.

programme.title: Algeria vs Sudan - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: This will be the first ever AFCON encounter between Algeria and Sudan. Sudan are unbeaten in their last two games against Algeria in all competitions, winning on penalties in the quarter finals of the African Nations Championship in August and a 0-0 draw in the FIFA Arab Cup earlier this month. Algeria are making their 21st appearance at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations. They will be attempting to win the trophy for the third time, after 1990 and 2019 – both previous victories were won on North African soil: at home in 1990 and in Egypt in 2019.

programme.title: Egypt vs South Africa - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: This will be the fourth encounter between Egypt and South Africa at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations. Egypt won the first two – a group game in 1996 and the final in 1998 – while South Africa came out on top in their last meeting in 2019. Egypt’s last victory against South Africa was in November 2006, a friendly played in London. Since then, they have drawn two and lost four of their meetings with Bafana Bafana.

programme.title: Angola vs Egypt - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: Angola and Egypt are meeting in the CAF Africa Cup of Nations for the third time. The two previous encounters produced Egypt wins, in the 1996 group stages and 2008 quarter-finals. Each of the last four encounters between Angola and Egypt has produced a goal from the penalty spot.

programme.desc: Angola and Egypt are meeting in the CAF Africa Cup of Nations for the third time. The two previous encounters produced Egypt wins, in the 1996 group stages and 2008 quarter-finals. Each of the last four encounters between Angola and Egypt has produced a goal from the penalty spot.

programme.title: Algeria vs Burkina Faso - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: Algeria and Burkina Faso are facing each other for the fourth time at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations, each time in the group stages. Their head-to-head record is so far perfectly balanced with one win each, a draw and five goals each. Algeria and Burkina Faso’s last three competitive encounters have all ended level, most recently a 2-2 draw in the group stage of the 2024 Africa Cup of Nations.

programme.desc: Algeria and Burkina Faso are facing each other for the fourth time at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations, each time in the group stages. Their head-to-head record is so far perfectly balanced with one win each, a draw and five goals each. Algeria and Burkina Faso’s last three competitive encounters have all ended level, most recently a 2-2 draw in the group stage of the 2024 Africa Cup of Nations.

programme.title: Tunisia vs Uganda - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: This will be the third encounter between Tunisia and Uganda at AFCON, but also their first meeting in the tournament for 47 years. Tunisia won both of their previous matches, scoring six goals and conceding only one. This is Tunisia’s 22nd participation in the CAF Africa Cup of Nations, and their 17th in a row, the latter being a record in the history of the tournament. Their only AFCON title dates back to 2004, as hosts; since then, they’ve progressed past the quarter-finals only once, in 2019, losing in the third-place match.

programme.title: Egypt vs South Africa - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: This will be the fourth encounter between Egypt and South Africa at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations. Egypt won the first two – a group game in 1996 and the final in 1998 – while South Africa came out on top in their last meeting in 2019. Egypt’s last victory against South Africa was in November 2006, a friendly played in London. Since then, they have drawn two and lost four of their meetings with Bafana Bafana.

programme.title: Benin vs Senegal - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: Benin and Senegal are meeting for the second time at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations. Their previous encounter came in the quarter-finals of the 2019 edition – Senegal won 1-0. Benin have lost six of their last seven matches against Senegal in all competitions, losing 1-0 most recently in a friendly in March 2024 via a Sadio Mané penalty.

programme.title: Uganda vs Nigeria - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: Uganda and Nigeria are meeting for the second time at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations, 47 years after their initial encounter. It was in the semi-finals of the 1978 edition – Uganda won 2-1. Uganda are unbeaten in their last three matches against Nigeria, winning two and drawing one. Nigeria’s last victory came in a March 2007 AFCON qualifier, thanks to a Nwankwo Kanu goal.

programme.title: Equatorial Guinea vs Algeria - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: Ibrahim Maza has completed the most dribbles and created the joint-most chances for Algeria at the 2025 CAF Africa Cup of Nations. If he plays in this match, he’ll be the first player under the age of 21 to appear in all three group stage games for Algeria in a single edition since Nabil Bentaleb in 2015. Iban Salvador is Equatorial Guinea’s top appearance maker at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations, but is currently on his longest run of games in the competition without a goal or assist. He hasn’t been involved in a goal since MD1 of the 2023 edition, netting his side’s only goal in a 1-1 draw with Nigeria.

programme.desc: The 2025 Africa Cup of Nations, commonly known as AFCON 2025, marks the 35th edition of this prestigious biennial tournament organized by the Confederation of African Football (CAF). programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.desc: The 2025 Africa Cup of Nations, commonly known as AFCON 2025, marks the 35th edition of this prestigious biennial tournament organized by the Confederation of African Football (CAF). This edition will be hosted by Morocco for the second time, following its previous hosting in 1988. Stay updated with comprehensive coverage of the AFCON Morcco 2025 on beIN Sports News.
